column1: Household Income and Wealth, Australia: Summary of Results, 2019–20
Table 13.2  GROSS HOUSEHOLD INCOME, States and territories, Total(a)
Income per week at top of selected percentiles
Ratio of incomes at top of selected income percentiles

Cells in this table containing 2019–20 data have been randomly adjusted (by perturbation) to avoid the release of confidential data. Discrepancies may occur between sums of the component items and totals. Differences may occur between tables only where estimates are produced for different units (e.g. person, household or expenditure units). See Methodologyfor more information
(a) Estimates compiled based on State and Territory quintile boundaries
(b) Households in SA1s defined as Very Remote were excluded, accounting for over 21% of the population of NT
(c) Lowest income quintile excluding the first and second percentiles. See Methodology for more information
